unittitle_ssm: Harold Fruchtbaum Research Collection on Espionage Cases
abstract_ssm: Collection principally contains FOIA files of FBI documents, and a few from other U.S. government agencies, pertaining to the espionage trial of Julius and Ethel Rosenberg, and that of Morton Sobell.  These files were requested, mostly during the 1970s-1980s by Harold Fruchtbaum, a professor at Columbia University's School of Public Health.
